## R Commands

1. 
```{r}
far <- c(24,15)
cel <- c()
for (i in far){
  val = ((i - 32) * 5)/9
  cel <- append(cel,val)
}
print(cel)
```

2. 

```{r}
vec200 <- integer(200)

for (i in 0:length(vec200)){
  if (i %% 2 == 1){
    vec200[i] = 3
  } else{
    vec200[i] = 1
  }
}
  
print(vec200)
```

3. 

```{r}
count = 0
for (i in 1:2001){
  if (sqrt(i) == floor(sqrt(i))){
    count <- count + 1
  }
}
  
print(count)
```
